snippet: The Mexican government said Friday that a quarter of the pre-Hispanic artifacts listed for sale in a Bonhams auction catalog are fakes and that it will take legal steps to win the return of the other, genuine artifacts....

headline.print_headline: Mexico Wants Artifacts in Bonhams Auction Returned
headline.main: Mexico Wants Artifacts in Bonhams Auction Returned

lead_paragraph: The Mexican government said Friday that a quarter of the pre-Hispanic artifacts listed for sale in a Bonhams auction catalog are fakes and that it will take legal steps to win the return of the other, genuine artifacts.
